title: Neo Init
description: Initialize angular application for neo structure

inlinetemplate.description: Include template inline in the component.ts file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

pathaliases.description: Add path aliases for assets, core, ... folders to tsconfig.

quotes.description: Changes quote setting in tslint to either single or double.

includestylepath.description: Adds style path to stylePreprocessorOptions to access global styling from components.

project.description: The name of the project. If not defined defaultProject gets used.
